page.title: 20LOWER TEST VALLEY,CONCLUSION
page.content: The area is affected by its position on the outskirts of Southampton and Winchester,for although it remains a farming area it is not isolated. We found it an interesting area to study.The countryside was pleasant,but we felt the electricity pylons which cross the Test valley spoil its appearance.Apart from this it has not changed very much since the first Domesday survey, and we wonder whether it will change in the next 900 years. The work was completed in Geography classes by 12_13_year_old girls from 3A,3B and 3C of the Atherley School, Southampton.
